front.title: Unapproved IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Microprocessor-Based Protection Equipment Firmware Control

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The scope of this Recommended Practice will be to identify the means for timely and efficient exchange of information between manufacturers and users of protection related equipment with respect to (i) changes in device firmware and (ii) the impact of those changes. It will also include an examination of the technical and operational ramifications resulting from changes in the device firmware. Only hardware changes that impact firmware changes will be included.
